name: Embed Vizme
author: Scott Ernst (Vizme)

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to easily embed Vizme Playlists and Collections within a WordPress blog.

For full details on the Vizme pluging visit Vizme WordPress Plugin

Usage

Use following tag to insert a Vizme Token or Collection.

[vizme url (optional aspect type: wide OR full)]

e.g.

[vizme http://www.vizme.com/?u=2j1Z&t=c&i=1CH full]
sections.installation:
1. Download EmbedVizme plugin
  2. Unzip
  3. Copy to your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory
  4. Activate plugin

You can find full details of installing a plugin on the plugin installation page

short_description: Allows for easy embedding of Vizme Playlists and Collections.
